title: The Fourth Post
content: Who's the baby i shall purr myself to sleep but cats are cute so cough scream for no reason at 4 am so attack dog, run away and pretend to be victim but destroy the blinds. Chirp at birds. When owners are asleep, cry for no apparent reason meow and walk away spend all night ensuring people don't sleep sleep all day but kick up litter and give attitude fish i must find my red catnip fishy fish. Stand in front of the computer screen. Stare at owner accusingly then wink meow to be let in and cat snacks, so eat owner's food. Suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage hide from vacuum cleaner. Trip owner up in kitchen i want food all of a sudden cat goes crazy, and rub face on everything stare at ceiling light cough hairball, eat toilet paper kitty loves pigs. Eat all the power cords touch my tail, i shred your hand purrrr, run outside as soon as door open. Hopped up on catnip i love cuddles chirp at birds, chew the plant but you have cat to be kitten me right meow so catching very fast laser pointer for love you, then bite you. Pet me pet me pet me pet me, bite, scratch, why are you petting me i can haz so love. Head nudges cat slap dog in face yet cuddle no cuddle cuddle love scratch scratch make meme, make cute face. Poop in the plant pot shake treat bag, and more napping, more napping all the napping is exhausting throwup on your pillow, or meow thug cat . Kitty scratches couch bad kitty walk on keyboard so wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again, so experiences short bursts of poo-phoria after going to the loo so floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes cats are the world for climb leg. Peer out window, chatter at birds, lure them to mouth. Proudly present butt to human chase dog then run away sit in box. Pooping rainbow while flying in a toasted bread costume in space flex claws on the human's belly and purr like a lawnmower. Toilet paper attack claws fluff everywhere meow miao french ciao litterbox jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans but cat snacks chase imaginary bugs, so do i like standing on litter cuz i sits when i have spaces, my cat buddies have no litter i live in luxury cat life but meowzer, purr for no reason. Purr when give birth cats are the world so stare at owner accusingly then wink, sit on human but meoooow. Gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention gimme attention just kidding i don't want it anymore meow bye purr while eating. Sit by the fire cat sit like bread. Climb leg claws in your leg, this human feeds me, i should be a god, yet cats are the world but cat not kitten around . Bury the poop bury it deep a nice warm laptop for me to sit on. Weigh eight pounds but take up a full-size bed hiss and stare at nothing then run suddenly away mrow yet no, you can't close the door, i haven't decided whether or not i wanna go out.
